item.title: 跨文化交流
item.description: 要直接还是要委婉 先说一个跨文化交流困惑： Smelly Cat (Originally Performed By Taylor Swift & Lisa Kudrow Phoebe) [Tribute Version] Viel Lounge Band - Smelly Cat (Originally Performed By Taylor Swift & Lisa Kudrow Phoebe) [Tribute Version]
